memberdef.name: LUAI_GCPAUSE
memberdef.initializer: 200 /* 200% (wait memory to double before next GC) */

memberdef.name: LUAI_GCMUL
memberdef.initializer: 200 /* GC runs 'twice the speed' of memory allocation */

memberdef.name: LUAI_USER_ALIGNMENT_T
memberdef.initializer: union { double u; void *s; long l; }
